item.title: 欧盟准备在美国贸易谈判中采取 "缓兵之计 "以达成更大协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）本周表示，瑞士和英国已跃居与美国达成贸易协议的前列，他同时警告欧盟，欧盟的行动 "要慢得多"。布鲁塞尔表示并不过分担心。【原文：When U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent this week said Switzerland and Britain had jumped to the front of the queue for a trade deal with the United States, he warned the European Union it was moving "much slower". Brussels says it is not overly worried.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟探索频道重塑 HBO Max 品牌，向全球推广
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）正在对 Max 的品牌进行倒带，将两年前从流媒体服务中撤下的 HBO 名字重新拿回来。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery is hitting rewind on Max's branding, bringing back the HBO name it dropped from the streaming service two years ago.】

item.title: 卡塔尔签署 2,000 亿美元协议，将在特朗普访问期间从波音公司购买喷气式飞机
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普访问海湾阿拉伯国家期间，卡塔尔于周三签署了一项协议，为卡塔尔航空公司购买美国制造商波音公司的喷气式飞机。【原文：Qatar signed a deal on Wednesday to purchase jets from U.S. manufacturer Boeing for Qatar Airways during President Donald Trump's visit to the Gulf Arab country.】

item.title: 罗氏称特朗普药价令威胁其 500 亿美元美国投资计划
item.description: 罗氏公司周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于药品定价的行政命令威胁到了该公司计划在美国投资 500 亿美元的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's executive order on drug pricing threatens Roche's planned $50 billion investment in the United States, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中央银行项目表明货币政策在 "代币化 "系统中依然可行
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备委员会和国际清算银行周三发布的一份联合报告的结论，在一个更加分散的金融体系中，中央银行应该仍然能够有效地实施货币政策，甚至可能更加灵活。【原文：Central banks should still be able to conduct monetary policy effectively and perhaps be even nimbler in a more decentralized financial system, according to the findings of a joint report released on Wednesday by the New York Federal Reserve and the Bank for International Settlements.】

item.title: 由于无线芯片需求稳定， Tower Semiconductor 预计季度收入高于预期
item.description: 受无线通信和电源管理芯片需求强劲的推动，合约芯片制造商 Tower Semiconductor 周三预计第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Contract chipmaker Tower Semiconductor , forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for wireless communication and power management chips.】

item.title: 高盛因未能正确报告数十亿笔交易而被罚款
item.description: 高盛将支付 145 万美元的民事罚款，以了结美国监管机构关于这家华尔街银行未能准确报告数十亿股票市场交易数据的指控。【原文：Goldman Sachs will pay a $1.45 million civil fine to settle a U.S. regulator's claims that the Wall Street bank failed to accurately report data for billions of stock market trades.】

item.title: MP Materials 与 Ma'aden 将在沙特联合开发稀土供应链
item.description: 美国稀土矿商 MP Materials 周三表示，该公司已与沙特阿拉伯旗舰矿业公司 Ma'aden 签署了一份谅解备忘录，将在中东国家共同开发稀土供应链。【原文：U.S. rare earths miner MP Materials said on Wednesday it has signed a memorandum of understanding with Saudi Arabia's flagship mining company Ma'aden to jointly develop a rare earth supply chain in the Middle Eastern country.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司首席执行官表示，美国养牛业者已经或即将开始重建牛群
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods）首席执行官唐尼-金（Donnie King）周三表示，在供应量降至 74 年来的最低点之后，美国养牛业者已经开始重建全国的牛群，或者即将重建。【原文：U.S. cattle producers have started rebuilding the nation's herd or are close to doing so, Tyson Foods CEO Donnie King said on Wednesday, after supplies dwindled to a 74-year low.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车运营商 Pony.ai 称其一辆车起火，无人员伤亡
item.description: 中国机器人出租车运营商 Pony.ai 周三表示，其一辆汽车在服务人员处理过程中因系统故障起火，但车上没有乘客。【原文：Chinese robotaxi operator Pony.ai said on Wednesday that one of its cars caught fire while being handled by service staff after a system malfunction, but that no passengers were onboard.】

item.title: 报告称，受关税影响，3 月份美国智能手机出货量增长 30
item.description: Counterpoint Research 公司周三称，由于苹果、三星和摩托罗拉等制造商预计美国将征收高额进口关税，因此急于将更多设备引入美国，3 月份美国智能手机出货量激增 30%。【原文：Smartphone shipments to the U.S. surged 30% in March as manufacturers Apple , Samsung and Motorola rushed to bring more devices into the country in anticipation of steep import tariffs, Counterpoint Research said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊预期经济放缓，关税导致未来通胀不确定
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）周三表示，近期的通胀数据表明，美国联邦储备委员会在实现2%的通胀目标方面继续取得进展，但由于新的进口税可能会推动价格上涨，因此目前前景并不明朗。【原文：Recent inflation data point to continued progress toward meeting the U.S. Federal Reserve's 2% inflation goal, but the outlook is now uncertain due to the possibility new import taxes will drive prices higher, Fed Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: AMD 宣布新的 60 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 芯片设计公司先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周三表示，其董事会已批准一项新的 60 亿美元的股票回购计划，从而将其总回购授权提高到约 100 亿美元。【原文：Chip designer Advanced Micro Devices said on Wednesday its board has approved a new $6 billion share buyback program, boosting its total repurchase authority to about $10 billion.】

item.title: 蓝鸟生物收到 PE 公司凯雷和 SK Capital 更高的预付报价
item.description: 青鸟生物和凯雷投资集团及 SK Capital Partners 周三表示，私募股权公司已开出每股 5 美元的预付款，收购这家基因治疗生产商。【原文：Bluebird bio and Carlyle Group and SK Capital Partners said on Wednesday that the private equity firms have offered $5 per share upfront to takeover the gene therapy maker.】

item.title: 联合健康首席执行官赫姆斯利将获得 100 万美元的基本年薪
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）首席执行官斯蒂芬-赫姆斯利（Stephen Hemsley）将获得 100 万美元的基本年薪和一次性 6000 万美元的股权奖励。【原文：UnitedHealth Group CEO Stephen Hemsley will get an annual base salary of $1 million and a one-time $60 million equity award as he returns to the top role at a tough time for the healthcare conglomerate.】

item.title: 欧佩克预计 2025 年石油价格下跌后竞争对手石油供应增长放缓
item.description: 欧佩克周三下调了对美国和欧佩克+集团以外其他产油国今年石油供应增长的预期，并表示预计油价下跌后资本支出将减少。【原文：OPEC on Wednesday trimmed its forecast for growth in oil supply from the United States and other producers outside the wider OPEC+ group this year and said it expected lower capital spending following a decline in oil prices.】

item.title: 关税休战为中国万圣节订单带来希望
item.description: 中美之间的关税休战有助于两国恢复贸易往来，但对于中国东部城市义乌的万圣节装饰品制造商来说，他们的心情却喜忧参半。【原文：A tariff truce between the United States and China is helping kickstart the resumption of trade between the countries but for manufacturers of Halloween decorations in the eastern Chinese city of Yiwu feelings are mixed.】

item.title: 独家报道番茄酱生产商卡夫亨氏投资 30 亿美元升级美国制造业
item.description: 卡夫亨氏正在斥资 30 亿美元升级其在美国的工厂，这是该公司十年来对其工厂的最大投资，尽管该公司高管称消费者情绪正处于 70 年来第二低点，而且该公司已下调了销售和利润预期。【原文：Kraft Heinz is spending $3 billion to upgrade its U.S. factories, its largest investment in its plants in a decade, even as executives say consumer sentiment is at its second-lowest point in 70 years, and it has cut sales and profit forecasts.】

item.title: 黑帮以加密货币财富为目标，女子逃脱巴黎拙劣绑架案
item.description: 一个蒙面团伙企图在巴黎绑架一名加密货币商人的女儿，这是近几个月来针对加密货币富豪及其家人的至少第三起暴力袭击事件，法国检察官正在对此展开调查。【原文：French prosecutors are investigating after a masked gang attempted to kidnap the daughter of a crypto businessman in Paris in what is at least the third violent attack targeting wealthy crypto players and their families in recent months.】

item.title: 古巴食糖产量进一步下降，令朗姆酒制造商感到不安
item.description: 据最近的官方报告和一位业内人士称，古巴的原糖年产量将在 2025 年降至 20 万吨以下，这是自 19 世纪以来的第一次，可能会导致朗姆酒制造商缺少一种关键原料。【原文：Cuban annual raw sugar production will fall below 200,000 metric tons in 2025 for the first time since the 19th century, potentially leaving rum makers short of a key ingredient, according to recent official reports and an industry source.】

item.title: 诺和诺德与 Septerna 达成 22 亿美元协议，开发肥胖症新疗法
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）周三表示，该公司已与美国生物技术公司Septerna达成了一项合作与许可协议，共同开发治疗肥胖症、2型糖尿病和其他心血管代谢疾病的口服小分子药物，Septerna公司的价值可达22亿美元。【原文：Novo Nordisk has struck a collaboration and licensing deal with U.S. biotech Septerna to develop oral small molecule medicines for obesity, type 2 diabetes and other cardio-metabolic diseases that could be worth up to $2.2 billion for Septerna, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 人工智能基础设施公司 TensorWave 最新融资 1 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于拉斯维加斯的初创公司 TensorWave 周三宣布，该公司在最新一轮融资中获得了 1 亿美元的资金，旨在利用迅速扩大的人工智能基础设施市场。【原文：TensorWave, a Las Vegas-based startup, announced on Wednesday that it has secured $100 million in the latest funding round, as it aims to capitalize on the rapidly expanding AI infrastructure market.】

item.title: 钢铁制造商纽柯在网络安全事件后停止部分生产
item.description: 钢铁制造商纽柯公司（Nucor）周三表示，在发现一起涉及第三方未经授权访问其使用的某些信息技术系统的网络安全事件后，该公司已停止了多个地点的某些生产。【原文：Steelmaker Nucor said on Wednesday it had halted certain production at various locations after identifying a cyber security incident that involved unauthorized third-party access to certain information technology systems it used.】

item.title: 消费者反弹加剧，小米电动车在华新订单下滑
item.description: 分析师周三表示，中国小米公司的 SU7 电动轿车新订单量正在下滑，该公司及其魅力四射的首席执行官正在努力应对日益增长的消费者反弹，这种反弹目前已威胁到其一飞冲天的销售业绩。【原文：China's Xiaomi is seeing a slump in new orders for its SU7 electric sedan, analysts said on Wednesday, as the company and its charismatic CEO grapple with a growing consumer backlash that now threatens its runaway sales success.】

item.title: 晨间活动："壮丽 7 号 "骑行回城
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）撰写的《当今美国和全球市场的重要事件》。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比：美联储等待了解关税影响，数据仍显嘈杂
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周三表示，数据显示4月份消费者通胀温和并不一定反映出美国进口关税上升的影响，美联储仍需要更多数据来判断物价和经济的走向。【原文：Data showing temperate consumer inflation in April does not necessarily reflect the impact of rising U.S. import tariffs, with the Federal Reserve still needing more data to discern the direction of prices and the economy, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉之后，更多的大公司提议投票 "Dexit "离开特拉华州
item.description: 路透社发现，在未来几周内，九家上市公司的投资者将就放弃将特拉华州作为公司注册地的提案进行投票，每家公司至少价值 10 亿美元，这可能会损害该州长期以来作为美国企业之都的声誉。【原文：In the coming weeks, investors in nine public companies worth at least $1 billion each will vote on proposals to ditch Delaware as their place of incorporation, potentially denting the state's longtime reputation as Corporate America's capital, Reuters has found.】

item.title: 高盛称投资者削减美元持有量，对美国恢复中性立场
item.description: 高盛集团总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）说，最近投资者对美元资产的减持表明，他们对该货币的立场已恢复到更加中性，而不是全面 "冲关"。【原文：Goldman Sachs President John Waldron said a recent lightening up of U.S. dollar assets by investors had shown them returning to more neutral positions on the currency, rather than a wholesale "run for the gates."】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Databricks 将以 10 亿美元收购初创公司 Neon
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，Databricks 已同意收购数据库初创公司 Neon，交易价值约为 10 亿美元，这家数据分析公司的目标是加强其在人工智能驱动的数据管理方面的能力。【原文：Databricks has agreed to buy database startup Neon in a deal valued at about $1 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, as the data analytics company aims to bolster its capabilities in artificial intelligence-powered data management.】

item.title: 印度批准海鑫-富士康合资半导体公司成立
item.description: 印度信息部长 Ashwini Vaishnaw 表示，印度内阁周三批准了由 HCL Technologies 和富士康合资的一家新半导体企业，该企业将位于北方邦，耗资 370.6 亿卢比（约合 4.3472 亿美元）。【原文：India's cabinet on Wednesday approved a new semiconductor unit, a joint venture between HCL Technologies and Foxconn , costing 37.06 billion rupees ($434.72 million) and to be located in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh, information minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said.】
